item.description: KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1341; 08:57PM; 11770 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Lo2Fiz; Hansen Dam; Firefighters stopped all forward progress of the fire, holding the size to approximately 10 acres with no structures damaged and no injuries reported. Crews will remain on scene through the night conducting mop up operations to ensure no hot spots remain. No further details and no further updates are anticipated.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 BC10 BC12 BC15 BP74 CM42 DZ11 E12 E24 E274 E275 E289 E290 E298 E39 E7 E75 E87 E89 E90 E91 E98 EM14 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 HE1 RA98 T74 T75 T89 T90 T98 WT77 WT88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#1341; 07:41PM; 11770 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Lo2Fiz; Hansen Dam; The fire is at approximately 8-10 acres, slowly creeping forward. Firefighters are getting handle on it and the head of the fire at a natural fire break. In addition to LA County Fire, ANF also has resources on scene. There continue to be no structures threatened and no injuries reported. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 BC10 BC12 BC15 BP74 CM42 DZ11 E12 E24 E274 E275 E289 E290 E298 E39 E7 E75 E87 E89 E90 E91 E98 EM14 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 HE1 RA98 T74 T75 T89 T90 T98 WT77 WT88; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#1341; 07:12PM; 11770 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Lo2Fiz; Hansen Dam; The fire is at approximately 6 acres with light (10-15pmh) winds and no ember cast. Firefighters continue to anchor, flank and pinch the fire. LA County Fire also has a brush response on scene. No structures threatened and no injuries reported. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 BC10 BC12 BP74 DZ11 E24 E274 E275 E290 E298 E75 E89 E90 E91 E98 EM14 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 HE1 RA98 T74 T75 T90 T98 WT77 WT88; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#1341; 06:29PM; 11770 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Lo2Fiz; Hansen Dam; Approximately 1/2 acre of medium to heavy brush burning under no wind conditions. There is no ember cast (hot embers being carried out from the fire which can cause spot fires). There are currently no structures threatened. LA County Fire is also sending a full brush fire response.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 BC10 BC12 BP74 E24 E274 E275 E290 E298 E75 E89 E91 E98 EM14 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA98 T74 T75 T90 T98; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Auto Fire - FATALITY; INC#1051; 03:59PM; 1629 S Maple Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w4HmMz; Downtown; Firefighters responded to an auto fire exposing a commercial building. Upon extinguishing the fire, a deceased person was located inside the vehicle (age/gender unknown). The fire was prevented from damaging the building. All media queries are referred to LAPD Inc# 3126 for the investigation. The 9-1-1 call was received at 3:34PM. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E14 E15 E2 E210 EM1 HR3 RA13 RA209 RA810 T10 T9; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0373; 08:41AM; 3717 S Mountain View Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F8ex61; Mar Vista; KNOCKDOWN: 39 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes. The fire was held to the 2nd floor with some extension into the attic. No other structures were damaged. There have not been any hospital transports as this time but one patient remains under evaluation, condition unknown. No further details.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E237 E263 E59 E63 E67 EM18 RA19 RA59 RA63 T37 T5 T63; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0373; 08:16AM; 3717 S Mountain View Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F8ex61; Mar Vista; Two story, single family dwelling with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode with fire on the 2nd floor with possible extension into the attic. One patient (age/gender unknown) is being evaluated for yet to be determined injuries/medical complaint. One additional task force was requested. ; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E237 E263 E59 E63 E67 EM18 RA19 RA59 RA63 T37 T5 T63; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Auto vs Ped - FATALITY; INC#0288; 07:58AM; 12800 W San Vicente Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3kxgmjj; Brentwood; Firefighters responded to a reported auto vs pedestrian and determined one person deceased on scene. (age/gender unknown). All questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD West LA Div Inc# 900 and LA County Coroner. The 9-1-1 call was received at 6:52AM. No further details.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; E19 RA37; CH4; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#0286; 07:20AM; Nb 405 Tr; MAP: https://bit.ly/375E7vK; Sherman Oaks; Firefighters are on scene of a multi-vehicle (to include one rollover) collision spread across a 1/4-1/2 mi section of the NB 405 Freeway. Patient count is currently 4 with no life threatening injuries (no further specifics on patients at this time). Traffic will remain heavily impacted and drivers are advised to seek alternate routes. Refer to CHP Log# 0640 for any traffic updates. The 9-1-1 call was received at 6:49AM. No further details.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 E109 E239 E288 E88 EM14 EM17 RA83 RA837 RA878 RA88 T39 T88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0197; 05:46AM; 1325 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Fc50eg; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 134 firefighters extinguished the fire in two hours and four minutes with no injuries reported. LAFD Arson is on scene, per protocol, for cause determination. Crews will remain through the morning as they chase down smoldering areas while working around safety hazards caused by the partial roof collapse. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E17 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E226 E227 E26 E266 E3 E9 EA1 EM1 HE1 HR3 PI4 RA10 RA14 RA209 RA809 RA810 RA827 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T21 T26 T27 T3 T66 T9 UR27 UR88; CH7; 14 15; Margaret Stewart
